description: BargeEx Vendor Document Inbox - searches and imports vendor documents (BargeStatus and BoatStatus) from BargeEx system

relatedForms.relationship: Modal dialog launched from Search form

primaryWorkflows.name: SearchAndImport
primaryWorkflows.description: User searches for vendor documents, selects items, and imports them as barge events or parts/service bills

steps.description: User enters optional search criteria: Vendor, Document Type (BargeStatus/BoatStatus subtypes), Control Number

steps.result: Calls RefreshList(True) which executes BargeExVendorDocumentInboxSearch.GetList and populates grid
steps.stateChange: Grid populated with results, Import/Discard buttons enabled if rows exist

steps.description: User clicks checkbox cells to toggle IsSelected flag on individual rows

validations.message: Warns if selected BargeStatus records don't have open tickets
Warns if selected revisions have no prior imported transaction

steps.description: Processes all selected rows in sort order (VendorName, BargeNum, OriginalControlNumber, RevisionNumber)

processing.logic: Creates new event or updates existing based on control number matching
Adds to existing ready-for-review P&S Bill or creates new one

steps.cancellation: User can click Cancel button, sets _UserCanceledRun flag checked in CancelRun()

steps.description: User reviews import log showing successes, errors, and summary counts
steps.buttonState: Start disabled, Cancel changes to Close

steps.trigger: Search form checks frm.ImportSuccessCount > 0 and calls RefreshList(False) if needed

primaryWorkflows.name: SearchAndDiscard
primaryWorkflows.description: User searches for vendor documents and discards unwanted ones

validation.message: Are you sure you want to discard the selected documents?

steps.processing: Calls Discard(_VendorDocInboxList) -> BargeExVendorDocumentInbox.MultiDelete with comma-delimited IDs

primaryWorkflows.name: CheckAllUncheckAll
primaryWorkflows.description: User selects or deselects all documents via toolbar

steps.trigger: Called by frmMain Toolbar Manager ToolClick event
steps.result: Sets IsSelected = True for all rows in _VendorDocInboxList

steps.trigger: Called by frmMain Toolbar Manager ToolClick event
steps.result: Sets IsSelected = False for all rows in _VendorDocInboxList

primaryWorkflows.name: AddMissingEntities
primaryWorkflows.description: User adds barges, boats, or locations that don't exist in system from BargeEx data

steps.description: User selects a row containing BargeEx data for non-existent entity

steps.trigger: Called by frmMain Toolbar Manager ToolClick event
steps.navigation: Opens appropriate detail form (frmBargeDetail, frmBoatDetail, frmFacilityDetail) with pre-populated values from BargeEx columns

initialization: FormatControls() - formats grid, populates vendor combo, populates document type combo
MyAppSettingHelper.RestoreGrid() - restores user's grid settings from database
PopulateDocumentTypeCombo - restricted to specific BargeStatus/BoatStatus subtypes

formStates.gridState: One or more rows have IsSelected = True

formStates.importFormState: Initial - Start enabled if selected rows exist, Cancel labeled 'Close'

formStates.processing: ProcessAll loop iterating through selected rows
formStates.cancellable: User can click Cancel to set _UserCanceledRun flag

formStates.cleanup: MyAppSettingHelper.SaveGrid() - saves user's grid settings to database

sessionState._SelectedFleetID: Passed from main form via OnChangeOfFleet, cleared when fleet changes
sessionState._VendorDocInboxList: DataTable holding search results, refreshed on Find/Import/Discard operations

gridPersistence.includes: Column widths, sort order, hidden columns

dataPersistence.searchResults: In-memory DataTable (_VendorDocInboxList), not persisted between sessions
dataPersistence.selectedRows: IsSelected column in DataTable, toggled via grid clicks or CheckAll/UncheckAll

eventHandlerChains.purpose: Initialize form controls and restore user settings

chain: -> Get selected rows sorted by VendorName, BargeNum, OriginalControlNumber, RevisionNumber
-> UpdateIDs() to propagate new IDs to revision rows
-> Build comma-delimited list of IDs where IsSelected = 1

eventHandlerChains.purpose: Clear results when fleet selection changes

closeConditions: User clicks Close button (after or before run)
Import completes successfully or with errors
modalDialogPatterns.returnValue: None (void), but parent checks ImportSuccessCount property

modalDialogPatterns.initialization: Initialize with new object pre-populated from BargeEx columns

refreshUpdateTriggers.description: Refresh after successful imports to remove imported records

refreshUpdateTriggers.trigger: Entity detail form closes with DialogResult.OK
refreshUpdateTriggers.description: Refresh after adding barge/boat/location to pick up newly matched entities
Clear results when user changes fleet selection

gridInteraction.checkboxClick: Custom handler in grdSearch_Click checks for IsSelected column

importDialog.proProgress: Updates with current record count / total
importDialog.txtLog: Real-time logging of each record processed
importDialog.summary: Final counts of successes and errors

importValidations: NoBarge: Barge doesn't exist in database
NoVendor: Vendor not associated with trading partner number
NoOriginal: Update transaction but no original record found
IsVoided: Ticket or event has been voided
AdjustmentForFinalBill: Vendor bill in Final Bill status can't be adjusted
errorHandling.displayMethod: Broken rules logged to txtLog, counters incremented

operations: NewBargeEvent(eventType, eventStage, FleetID, BargeNum/BargeID, TicketID, options)
BargeEvent.eventTypes: BreakTow, Clean, CoverHandling, Fleeting, MakeTow, MidstreamIn, MidstreamOut, Pumping, Shift
BargeEvent.revisionHandling: Updates existing TicketEvent if OriginalControlNumber matches BargeExVendorControlNumber

PartsServiceBill.billSelection: Finds existing ready-for-review bill for customer/vendor/division or creates new

directAccessCalls.purpose: Find existing TicketEvent by BargeID, VendorID, BargeExVendorControlNumber
Find existing PartsServiceBillItem by VendorID, BargeExVendorControlNumber

securityAuthorization.controlAuthorization: Set via SetButtonTypes() and ControlAuthorization object

notes: This is a specialized form for importing vendor documents from BargeEx EDI system
Supports two document types: BargeStatus (creates barge events) and BoatStatus (creates parts/service bills)
Import process handles both new transactions and revisions (updates)
Revision handling: OriginalControlNumber differs from ControlNumber, system matches via BargeExVendorControlNumber field
Additional Clean Type: Special handling where PrimaryControlNumber points to original Clean event
Duplicate detection: GlobalSetting option to skip Fleeting events that already exist (created by BargeOps logic)
Ticket management: Events added to existing open tickets or new tickets created as needed
Division is always set to 'Outside Vendor' for imported events
Events never close tickets automatically (MarkedForClose = False)
Parts & Service Bills added to existing ready-for-review bills when possible
Customer for P&S Bills is Operator of Freight division (DivisionCode.OperatorID where Division = Freight)
Toolbar integration: CheckAll, UncheckAll, and ItemAdd* actions called from frmMain ToolClick event
Grid is custom formatted to allow checkbox interaction in IsSelected column while maintaining RowSelect mode
Sort order for import ensures correct processing of original transactions before revisions
Import can be cancelled mid-process via Cancel button, setting _UserCanceledRun flag
Successfully imported records are immediately deleted from BargeExVendorDocumentInbox table
Form persists grid settings (column widths, sort, hidden columns) per user in database
